name: serialized-editor
description: A Vue.js component for editing data that has been serialized in PHP
author: Gilbert Pellegrom <gilbert@pellegrom.me>

scripts.app:dev: npm run lib:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --config build/webpack.app.js --open --hot
scripts.app:build: npm run lib:build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config build/webpack.app.js --progress --hide-modules
